What\'s new with Field Nation

We have completed our first phase of the work order details redesign and will continue this effort in future updates. This version also has improvements to our upload process. You now have the ability to manually retry uploads and you\'ll receive a push notification when an upload fails.

What we added:
  • More robust handling of failed uploads
  • Time zone information display to time and date fields
  • File upload size check to help prevent data waste
  • Ability to copy data from most fields with a long tap
What we changed:
  • More design updates to the work order details
  • Renamed Custom Fields to Fields to Enter
  • Removed unneeded background processes
  • Improved work order performance by giving Tasks and Fields to Enter their own subsection
  • Persistent data input on the following dialogs: Request New Pay, Custom Fields, Time Logs, Closing Notes, Expenses, and work order list filters.
Bugs we fixed:
  • Work order card crashes due to data input
  • Currency display
  • Map view loading issue when GPS isn\'t available
  • Seeing on hold work orders when sending files to Field Nation from a 3rd party app
  • Data loading in dialogs
